speaker: HOSTESS
text: Master Fang, have you entered the action?

speaker: FANG
text: It is entered.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Where’s your yeoman? Is ’t a lusty yeoman?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Will he stand to ’t?

speaker: FANG
text: Sirrah! Where’s Snare?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: O Lord, ay, good Master Snare.

speaker: SNARE
text: Here, here.

speaker: FANG
text: Snare, we must arrest Sir John Falstaff.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Yea, good Master Snare, I have entered him

speaker: HOSTESS
text: and all.

speaker: SNARE
text: It may chance cost some of us our lives, for he

speaker: SNARE
text: will stab.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Alas the day, take heed of him. He stabbed me

speaker: HOSTESS
text: in mine own house, and that most beastly, in good

speaker: HOSTESS
text: faith. He cares not what mischief he does. If his

speaker: HOSTESS
text: weapon be out, he will foin like any devil. He will

speaker: HOSTESS
text: spare neither man, woman, nor child.

speaker: FANG
text: If I can close with him, I care not for his thrust.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: No, nor I neither. I’ll be at your elbow.

speaker: FANG
text: An I but fist him once, an he come but within my

speaker: FANG
text: view—

speaker: HOSTESS
text: I am undone by his going. I warrant you, he’s

speaker: HOSTESS
text: an infinitive thing upon my score. Good Master

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Fang, hold him sure. Good Master Snare, let him

speaker: HOSTESS
text: not ’scape. He comes continuantly to Pie Corner,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: saving your manhoods, to buy a saddle, and he is

speaker: HOSTESS
text: indited to dinner to the Lubber’s Head in Lumbert

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Street, to Master Smooth’s the silkman. I pray you,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: since my exion is entered, and my case so openly

speaker: HOSTESS
text: known to the world, let him be brought in to his

speaker: HOSTESS
text: answer. A hundred mark is a long one for a poor

speaker: HOSTESS
text: lone woman to bear, and I have borne, and borne,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: and borne, and have been fubbed off, and fubbed

speaker: HOSTESS
text: off, and fubbed off from this day to that day, that it is

speaker: HOSTESS
text: a shame to be thought on. There is no honesty in

speaker: HOSTESS
text: such dealing, unless a woman should be made an

speaker: HOSTESS
text: ass and a beast to bear every knave’s wrong. Yonder

speaker: HOSTESS
text: he comes, and that arrant malmsey-nose knave,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Bardolph, with him. Do your offices, do your offices,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Master Fang and Master Snare, do me, do me,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: do me your offices.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: How now, whose mare’s dead? What’s the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: matter?

speaker: FANG
text: Sir John, I arrest you at the suit of Mistress

speaker: FANG
text: Quickly.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Away, varlets!—Draw, Bardolph. Cut me off

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the villain’s head. Throw the quean in the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: channel.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Throw me in the channel? I’ll throw thee in

speaker: HOSTESS
text: the channel. Wilt thou, wilt thou, thou bastardly

speaker: HOSTESS
text: rogue?—Murder, murder!—Ah, thou honeysuckle

speaker: HOSTESS
text: villain, wilt thou kill God’s officers and the King’s?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Ah, thou honeyseed rogue, thou art a honeyseed, a

speaker: HOSTESS
text: man-queller, and a woman-queller.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Keep them off, Bardolph.

speaker: OFFICERS
text: A rescue, a rescue!

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Good people, bring a rescue or two.—Thou

speaker: HOSTESS
text: wot, wot thou? Thou wot, wot ta? Do, do, thou

speaker: HOSTESS
text: rogue. Do, thou hempseed.

speaker: PAGE
text: Away, you scullion, you rampallian, you fustilarian!

speaker: PAGE
text: I’ll tickle your catastrophe.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
What
               
              is
               
              the
               
              matter
              ?
               
              Keep
               
              the
               
              peace
               
              here
              ,
               
              ho
              !

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Good my lord, be good to me. I beseech you

speaker: HOSTESS
text: stand to me.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              Sir
               
              John
              ?
               
              What
              ,
               
              are
               
              you
               
              brawling
               
              here
              ?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
Doth
               
              this
               
              become
               
              your
               
              place
              ,
               
              your
               
              time
              ,
               
              and
               
              business
              ?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
You
               
              should
               
              have
               
              been
               
              well
               
              on
               
              your
               
              way
               
              to
               
              York
              .
              —

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Stand from him, fellow. Wherefore hang’st thou

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: upon him?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: O my most worshipful lord, an ’t please your

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Grace, I am a poor widow of Eastcheap, and he is

speaker: HOSTESS
text: arrested at my suit.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: For what sum?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: It is more than for some, my lord; it is for all I

speaker: HOSTESS
text: have. He hath eaten me out of house and home. He

speaker: HOSTESS
text: hath put all my substance into that fat belly of his.

speaker: HOSTESS
text:
To
                 
                Falstaff
                .
                 
              But I will have some of it out again, or I

speaker: HOSTESS
text: will ride thee o’ nights like the mare.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I think I am as like to ride the mare if I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: any vantage of ground to get up.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: How comes this, Sir John? Fie, what

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: man of good temper would endure this tempest of

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: exclamation? Are you not ashamed to enforce a

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: poor widow to so rough a course to come by her

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: own?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What is the gross sum that I owe thee?

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Marry, if thou wert an honest man, thyself

speaker: HOSTESS
text: and the money too. Thou didst swear to me upon a

speaker: HOSTESS
text: parcel-gilt goblet, sitting in my Dolphin chamber at

speaker: HOSTESS
text: the round table by a sea-coal fire, upon Wednesday

speaker: HOSTESS
text: in Wheeson week, when the Prince broke thy head

speaker: HOSTESS
text: for liking his father to a singing-man of Windsor,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: thou didst swear to me then, as I was washing thy

speaker: HOSTESS
text: wound, to marry me and make me my lady thy wife.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Canst thou deny it? Did not Goodwife Keech, the

speaker: HOSTESS
text: butcher’s wife, come in then and call me Gossip

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Quickly, coming in to borrow a mess of vinegar,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: telling us she had a good dish of prawns, whereby

speaker: HOSTESS
text: thou didst desire to eat some, whereby I told thee

speaker: HOSTESS
text: they were ill for a green wound? And didst thou not,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: when she was gone downstairs, desire me to be no

speaker: HOSTESS
text: more so familiarity with such poor people, saying

speaker: HOSTESS
text: that ere long they should call me madam? And didst

speaker: HOSTESS
text: thou not kiss me and bid me fetch thee thirty

speaker: HOSTESS
text: shillings? I put thee now to thy book-oath. Deny it if

speaker: HOSTESS
text: thou canst.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: My lord, this is a poor mad soul, and she says

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: up and down the town that her eldest son is like

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you. She hath been in good case, and the truth is,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: poverty hath distracted her. But, for these foolish

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: officers, I beseech you I may have redress against

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: them.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Sir John, Sir John, I am well acquainted

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: with your manner of wrenching the true cause the

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: false way. It is not a confident brow, nor the throng

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: of words that come with such more than impudent

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: sauciness from you, can thrust me from a level

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: consideration. You have, as it appears to me, practiced

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: upon the easy-yielding spirit of this woman,

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: and made her serve your uses both in purse and in

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: person.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Yea, in truth, my lord.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Pray thee, peace.—Pay her the debt you

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: owe her, and unpay the villainy you have done with

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: her. The one you may do with sterling money, and

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: the other with current repentance.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: My lord, I will not undergo this sneap without

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: reply. You call honorable boldness “impudent

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: sauciness.” If a man will make curtsy and say

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: nothing, he is virtuous. No, my lord, my humble

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: duty remembered, I will not be your suitor. I say to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you, I do desire deliverance from these officers,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: being upon hasty employment in the King’s affairs.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: You speak as having power to do wrong;

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: but answer in th’ effect of your reputation, and

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: satisfy the poor woman.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come hither, hostess.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Now, Master Gower, what news?

speaker: GOWER
text:
The
               
              King
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              and
               
              Harry
               
              Prince
               
              of
               
              Wales

speaker: GOWER
text:
Are
               
              near
               
              at
               
              hand
              .
               
              The
               
              rest
               
              the
               
              paper
               
              tells
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: As I am a gentleman!

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Faith, you said so before.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: As I am a gentleman. Come. No more words

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of it.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: By this heavenly ground I tread on, I must be

speaker: HOSTESS
text: fain to pawn both my plate and the tapestry of my

speaker: HOSTESS
text: dining chambers.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Glasses, glasses, is the only drinking. And for

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thy walls, a pretty slight drollery, or the story of the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Prodigal or the German hunting in waterwork is

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: worth a thousand of these bed-hangers and these

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fly-bitten tapestries. Let it be ten pound, if thou

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: canst. Come, an ’twere not for thy humors, there’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: not a better wench in England. Go wash thy face,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and draw the action. Come, thou must not be in this

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: humor with me. Dost not know me? Come, come. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: know thou wast set on to this.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Pray thee, Sir John, let it be but twenty

speaker: HOSTESS
text: nobles. I’ faith, I am loath to pawn my plate, so God

speaker: HOSTESS
text: save me, la.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Let it alone. I’ll make other shift. You’ll be a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fool still.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Well, you shall have it, though I pawn my

speaker: HOSTESS
text: gown. I hope you’ll come to supper. You’ll pay

speaker: HOSTESS
text: me all together?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Will I live?
                 
                Aside
                 
                to
                 
                Bardolph
                .
               Go with her,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: with her. Hook on, hook on.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Will you have Doll Tearsheet meet you at

speaker: HOSTESS
text: supper?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: No more words. Let’s have her.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: I have heard better news.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What’s the news, my good

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: lord?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Where lay the King

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: tonight?

speaker: GOWER
text: At Basingstoke, my lord.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I hope, my lord, all’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: well. What is the news, my lord?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Come all his forces back?

speaker: GOWER
text:
No
              .
               
              Fifteen
               
              hundred
               
              foot
              ,
               
              five
               
              hundred
               
              horse

speaker: GOWER
text:
Are
               
              marched
               
              up
               
              to
               
              my
               
              Lord
               
              of
               
              Lancaster

speaker: GOWER
text:
Against
               
              Northumberland
               
              and
               
              the
               
              Archbishop
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Comes
               
              the
               
              King
               
              back
               
              from
               
              Wales
              ,
               
              my
               
              noble
               
              lord
              ?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
You
               
              shall
               
              have
               
              letters
               
              of
               
              me
               
              presently
              .

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text:
Come
              .
               
              Go
               
              along
               
              with
               
              me
              ,
               
              good
               
              Master
               
              Gower
              .

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: My lord!

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: What’s the matter?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Gower, shall I entreat you with me to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: dinner?

speaker: GOWER
text: I must wait upon my good lord here. I thank

speaker: GOWER
text: you, good Sir John.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Sir John, you loiter here too long, being

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: you are to take soldiers up in counties as you go.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Will you sup with me, Master Gower?

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: What foolish master taught you these

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: manners, Sir John?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Gower, if they become me not, he was

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: a fool that taught them me.—This is the right

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fencing grace, my lord: tap for tap, and so part fair.

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: Now the Lord lighten thee. Thou art a

speaker:
CHIEF
               
              JUSTICE
text: great fool.
